auth.title: yorha
auth.subtitle2: じんるいへのかがやき
auth.error_pass_message: Something went wrong. Please check the user and password.

start.title: Start Menu
start.subtitle: スタートメニュー
start.fabrication_desc1: Click on the button below to access to
start.fabrication_desc1_3: . You will be able to create an android with the following features:

fabrication.subtitle: 製造
fabrication.caution_message: In order to submit the following form, the following requirements must be met:
fabrication.caution_list1: It has to be one of the two available models.
fabrication.caution_list2: If the android is a 'YoRHa' model, it must have a rol. The name will be autofilled with the necessary information.
fabrication.caution_list3: If the android is a 'Special' model, the name must be written.
fabrication.subcaution: *If you didn't select an appearance when submitting the form, it will be autofilled in with the 'Female' appearance.
fabrication.operator_info: Remember to assign an android if you create an Operator YoRHa model!

system.title: System
system.subtitle: データベース
system.info_desc: Here you can add or remove android types,
system.mark_desc: assign androids to an 'Operator' android type
system.info_desc2: and assign to an android an 'Executioner' android type.
system.caution_desc: You can`t assign a 'Executioner' to a Operator.

information.title: Information
information.desc: The necessary information will be shown here.
